column16: Monica Vinader Scented Candle - Fig Fragrance
column18:
Revive with a Fig fragrance that fills a room to the brim.
Natural vegetable waxes are poured by hand into hand-painted
glasses, complete with a cotton wick that gives a clean burn.

100% pure essential oils harvested in Grasse, France
Candle height 9.2cm, diameter tapers 7.6-6.6cm
Burn time approx 45 hrs

column16: Ceramic Nesting Dishes - Island Yellow
column18:
Introducing Monica Vinader homeware. Created with ceramicist
Florence St George, this set of three hand-finished nesting bowls
is glazed in a soft yellow, inspired by hues of Bahamian conch
shells. Each bowl carries traces of the maker's hands, and is
finished with a hand painted gold edge to catch the light and
brighten the home.
Food safe. Hand wash with care.

Large bowl height 11cm, width 12cm, depth 4.5cm
Medium bowl height 8.2cm, width 8.5cm, depth 3.8cm
Small bowl height 6.8cm, width 7cm, depth 3.2cm
Bowl thickness 2mm - 4mm

column16: Jewellery Care Kit
column18:
Clean, brighten and preserve your Monica Vinader jewellery. From
gold vermeil to solid gold and sterling silver, caring for your
jewellery will ensure it lasts a lifetime.
The kit contains:

Specifically formulated cleaning solution
Reusable polishing cloth
Soft bristle brush

* earrings not included.
For full jewellery care instructions, please click here.

column16: Sterling Silver Linear Friendship Bracelet - Mink
column18:
Where it all began. Friendship doesn't get more classic than
this. Our hand woven bracelet is designed with a slider that glides
to fit you perfectly. Keep on your wrist always, gift to a loved
one, or engrave a special message.

100% Nylon Mink cord, Meaning: Success
Total bracelet circumference adjustable up to 25.5cm
Bar length 3.5cm, width 4mm
The Linear design is protected by Community Design Registration
No. 002695205-0001

We're committed to delivering high-quality, sustainable pieces.
Due to this, our Linear Friendship Bracelets have a small square
supplier symbol on the inside of the bar, to help recognise where
the piece came from.

column16: Sterling Silver Fiji Friendship Petite Chain Bracelet
column18:
This chic chain bracelet comes in a slightly smaller size for
petite wrists. The bracelet features a smooth, curved bar in
Sterling Silver. The bar measures 10.8cm in length, with a gap of
approximately 5cm between each end. A toggle slides to easily
adjust the chain's length for a snug fit. This piece looks gorgeous
layered up with your favourite MV bracelets. Personalise with an
engraving on the front of the bar and on the toggle.
For more information on petite sizing, please contact Customer
Care.

column16: Gold Vermeil Peaceful Dove Pendant Charm
column18:
With symbolism dating back to the 4th century, the peaceful dove
engraved on this pendant represents hope and peace. This delicate
treasure combines past wisdom with present style. Want to add that
personal touch? The plain reverse is ready for your own engraving,
making this the perfect new age heirloom.

Pendant height 16.5mm, width 16.5mm
Pendant thickness 1.5mm
Stone height 14.5mm, stone width 14.5mm

This piece is sterling silver with a hand-finished black rhodium
patina and gold vermeil bezel. The technique with the black rhodium
makes each unique.

column16: Sterling Silver Signature Bangle
column18:
Combining strong clean lines with flowing curves, the
handcrafted Signature bangle is both modern and feminine. The
simple silhouette fits comfortably around your wrist, with a hinged
bar that easily opens and closes with a snap fastener. The standard
size bangle measures 54.3mm in length and 61.6mm in width, and is
suitable for a wrist size up to 16.5cm/ 6.5" in circumference. The
bar measures 46.4mm in length, 8mm in width &amp; 2.5mm in
depth.
Wear effortlessly alone or stack with the Signature Thin bangle
for bold look.
Personalise your bangle on the outside and inside of the bar
using our complimentary engraving service for that truly unique
style.
The Signature design is protected by Community Design
Registration No. 002821538-0001-0003

column16: Gold Vermeil Signature Bangle
column18:
Combining strong clean lines with flowing curves, the
handcrafted Signature bangle is both modern and feminine. The
simple silhouette fits comfortably around your wrist, with a hinged
bar that easily opens and closes with a snap fastener. The standard
size bangle measures 54.3mm in length and 61.6mm in width, and is
suitable for a wrist size up to 16.5cm/ 6.5 in circumference. The
bar measures 46.4mm in length, 8mm in width &amp; 2.5mm in
depth.
Wear effortlessly alone or stack with the Signature Thin bangle
for bold look.

column16: Gold Vermeil Baja Bracelet - Grey Agate
column18:
Inspired by the Art Deco era and modernist architecture, this
Baja Facet Friendship Chain bracelet features a geometric,
hand-cut, multi-faceted Grey Agate gemstone, representing
'grounding'. Set in Sterling Silver, the bracelet measures 6.5mm in
width and 38mm in length, with an adjustable toggle which easily
slides for a snug fit. Engrave the inside of your bracelet with a
personal message or special date, for a piece that means more.
Stack and style with our classic Baja bracelets to create your
perfect colour combination.

column16: Gold Vermeil Baja Bracelet - Red Onyx
column18:
This art deco inspired bracelet in 18ct Gold Plated Vermeil on
Sterling Silver is set with a multi-faceted Red Onyx gemstone. The
sleek chain and clasp feature offers a smooth, adjustable
fastening. Mix colours and stack with the Fiji and Bali Friendship
Bracelets to create an on-trend look. The bar measures
approximately 38mm x 6.5mm (1.5 x 0.3'). The Red Onyx gemstone is
8.05 carats.

column16: Sterling Silver Deia Locket
column18:
Inspired by ancient goddesses. Worn by you. A hammered locket,
ready to engrave as a gift or treasured talisman for your own
collection.

Locket length 2cm, width 2cm, depth 0.6mm

We can only engrave an image containing clean black lines on a
white background. We cannot engrave filled in areas, areas
containing shading, or images containing too much detail. As a
result, we are unfortunately unable to engrave photographs.
To add a photo at home, please 
click here to use our handy guide.

Gold Vermeil on Sterling Silver. The band has a slightly waved
edge, reminiscent of the sea. The stone on this ring measures
approximately 8mm x 7mm (0.3 x 0.28'). The band measures
approximately 1.5mm (0.06') thick at widest point.

column16: Gold Diamond Marquise Stacking Ring - Diamond
column18:
A wise investment. Update your ring stack with a sparkling round
diamond set in a marquise-inspired setting in a delicate 14kt solid
gold band. Inspired by the feminine 18th Century marquise diamond,
our round diamonds sit in a marquise-inspired setting that takes
its name from the Marquise Madame de Pompadour, whose perfectly
shaped mouth was said to have inspired Louis XIV of France to
create this stone in her honor.

Total Diamond Weight: 0.016Cts, Quality: I2, Cut: Full Cut
Band height 1mm, depth 1mm
Disc height 2.65mm, disc width 4.6mm
Stone depth 1.5mm, width 1.5mm, depth 1.5mm

column16: Gold Vermeil Fiji Friendship Petite Chain Bracelet
column18:
This chic chain bracelet comes in a slightly smaller size for
petite wrists. The bracelet features a smooth, curved bar in 18ct
Gold Vermeil on Sterling Silver. The bar measures 10.8cm in length,
with a gap of approximately 5cm between each end. A toggle slides
to easily adjust the chain's length for a snug fit. This piece
looks gorgeous layered up with your favourite MV bracelets.
Personalise with an engraving on the front of the bar and on the
toggle.
For more information on petite sizing, please contact Customer
Care.

column16: Rose Gold Vermeil Siren Large Coin Gemstone Pendant Charm - Pink Topaz
column18:
Cast from an ancient coin from around the time that the Iceni
people would have been settled in Norfolk, the Siren Coin is a
must-have talisman for power and independence. Set in 18ct Rose
Gold Vermeil on Sterling Silver, this unique Siren Small Coin
pendant charm measures 22mm in width and 23mm in length. The
perfect gift to yourself, capture your memories by adding this
charm to your necklace chain or favourite Alta Capture piece.

column16: Gold Vermeil Deia Pebble Locket
column18:
Inspired by ancient wisdom and nature's organic beauty, our Deia
collection is gently faceted to reflect the light. Engrave this
pebble-shaped locket inside and out, and place a special keepsake
inside to ensure it's always close to your heart.

Pendant height 26.8mm, width 20.55mm
Pendant thickness 5.3mm

We can only engrave an image containing clean black lines on a
white background. We cannot engrave filled in areas, areas
containing shading, or images containing too much detail. As a
result, we are unfortunately unable to engrave photographs.
To add a photo at home, please 
click here to use our handy guide.

column16: Gold Diamond Marquise Chain Bracelet - Diamond
column18:
Prepare to be dazzled. Inspired by the feminine 18th Century
marquise diamond, our round diamonds sit in a marquise-inspired
setting on a delicate 14k solid gold chain that takes its name from
the Marquise Madame de Pompadour, whose perfectly shaped mouth was
said to have inspired Louis XIV of France to create this stone in
her honor. Looks great worn alone or layered; it's an investment
piece you'll wear forever.

Total Diamond Weight: 0.016Cts, Quality: I2, Cut: Full Cut
Bracelet circumference: Small 15.2cm/6", Medium: 16.5cm/6.5",
Large: 19cm/7.5"
Stone height 1.5mm, width 1.5mm, depth 1.5mm

column16: Gold Vermeil Kate Young Gemstone Bangle - Black Onyx
column18:
Bespoke-cut black onyx is set in a hand-polished bangle with
sleek, sculptural appeal. Designed in collaboration with celebrity
stylist Kate Young, this innovative bracelet looks great worn alone
or stacked in multiples for a bold style statement.

Small: Bangle inner diameter 5.65cm, height 4.5cm, opening
width 6cm. For wrist sizes up to 15cm / 6in.
Medium: Bangle inner diameter 6cm, height 4.8cm, opening width
6.9cm. For wrist sizes up to 16.5cm / 6.5in.
Large: Bangle inner diameter 6.5cm, height 5.2cm, opening width
7.1cm. For wrist sizes up to 17cm / 7in.

By using natural gemstones, they are naturally vulnerable to
chipping or breaking with impact. We urge customers to handle their
jewellery with care and store them in one of our Leather Jewellery
boxes or packaging boxes for safekeeping.

the piece came from.

column16: Sterling Silver Deia Pebble Locket
column18:
Inspired by pebbles lightly worn by water, the Deia Pebble
Locket is gently hammered to reflect the light. Engrave this
keepsake inside and out, and place up to two photos on the inside
to ensure they're always close to your heart.

Pendant height 26.8mm, width 20.55mm
Pendant thickness 5.3mm

We can only engrave an image containing clean black lines on a
white background. We cannot engrave filled in areas, areas
containing shading, or images containing too much detail. As a
result, we are unfortunately unable to engrave photographs.
To add a photo at home, please 
click here to use our handy guide.

column16: Gold Vermeil Deia Locket
column18:
Inspired by ancient goddesses. Worn by you. A hammered locket,
ready to engrave as a gift or treasured talisman for your own
collection.

Locket length 2cm, width 2cm, depth 0.6mm

We can only engrave an image containing clean black lines on a
white background. We cannot engrave filled in areas, areas
containing shading, or images containing too much detail. As a
result, we are unfortunately unable to engrave photographs.
To add a photo at home, please 
click here to use our handy guide.

guidance, whenever you need it. Want to make it personal? The
pendant's reverse is waiting for your own engraving to add that
special touch.

Pendant thickness 1.1mm
star height 13mm, star width 13mm

column16: Gold Vermeil Keshi Pearl Pendant Charm - Pearl
column18:
Sustainably celebrating all forms of beauty, in collaboration
with Mother of Pearl. This single pendant charm is adorned with a
striking keshi pearl, ready to drape from your huggies or chains.
Naturally nuanced by the ocean, each one is unique, with its own
delicately faceted finish.

Pendant height varies 15mm - 23mm, width varies 12mm -
23mm
Pendant thickness varies 3mm - 8mm

This piece is completed with our signature soft satin
finish.

column16: Gold Vermeil Keshi Pearl Bracelet - Pearl
column18:
A sustainable celebration of all forms of beauty, in
collaboration with Mother of Pearl. This hand-crafted bracelet
pairs natural keshi pearls with sterling silver pearl shapes, cast
in lustrous recycled gold vermeil. Use the pendant carrier to add a
charm from the collection, or style it your own way.

Bracelet circumference; Large 20cm / 8", Medium 19cm / 7.5",
Small 18cm / 7"
Stone height varies 8mm - 9.5mm, width 6.5mm - 7.5mm

This piece is completed with our signature soft satin
finish.

column16: Gold Vermeil Diamond Essential Tennis Bracelet - Diamond
column18:
The tennis bracelet made modern. A sleek and simple 18k gold
vermeil bezel cup surrounds each brilliant diamond solitaire in
this everyday essential bracelet, designed to catch the light with
every gesture. (Oh, hey!)

Total Diamond Weight: 0.11Cts, Quality: I-1, Cut: Single
Cut
Small-Medium: Bracelet circumference
16.5cm/6.5", Medium-Large: Bracelet circumference
17.8cm/7.5"
Chain width 3.6mm, depth 2.9mm
Stone height 0.8mm, width 0.8mm, depth 0.8mm

Our Tennis Bracelet features two robust locking mechanisms for
your peace of mind. The first, on the side of the lock works by
manouevering a lever with a fingernail or thumb, locking the
bracelet in place. The second is a 'tongue' inserted into the box
lock and is unlocked with the button.
